idea-plugin.name: Devek
idea-plugin.description:
A powerful SaaS platform that boosts developer productivity and streamlines development workflows through actionable insights.

Key Features

  • Development Insights: Gain valuable metrics and analytics about your coding patterns and workflow
  • Productivity Optimization: Identify areas for improvement and efficiency gains in your development process
  • Workflow Streamlining: Optimize your development workflow with data-driven recommendations
  • Real-time Analytics: Get instant feedback on your development activities

Getting Started

  1. Install the Devek plugin from JetBrains Marketplace
  2. Access your development insights through the Devek tool window (located on the right side)
  3. View your productivity metrics and workflow recommendations in real-time

Requirements

  • IntelliJ-based IDEs version 2024.3 or later
  • Java 21 or later
  • Devek account (sign up at https://www.devek.dev)

For more information, documentation, and to create your Devek account, visit https://www.devek.dev
